docs.snippet: Foreign exchange "clubs" are being formed about the world, creating a kind of ersatz convertibility for the currencies of the countries involved.

docs.snippet: BOURNEMOUTH, England, April 26 (UP)--Three American players, Ham Richardson, Budge Patty and Darlene Hard, won semifinal berths today in the British hard court tennis tournament.

docs.snippet: SAN JOSE, Costa Rica--If all the recommendations  voted here by the Sixth Inter-American Travel Congress are adopted by its parent body, the Organization of American States, the Western Hemisphere will soon become a land of nomads.

docs.snippet: LAS VEGAS, Nev., April 29 (AP)--California's Gene Littler hit a second $10,000 golfing jackpot today when he won the $38,500 Tournament of Champions in a last round duel with Cary Middlecoff.
docs.lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS, Nev., April 29 (AP)--California's Gene Littler hit a second $10,000 golfing jackpot today when he won the $38,500 Tournament of Champions in a last round duel with Cary Middlecoff.

headline.main: LITTLER IS VICTOR IN GOLF WITH 28 Takes Las Vegas Tournament for Second Straight Year --Middlecoff Is Second Cancer Fund Aided THE SCORES Miss Rawls Triumphs THE LEADING SCORES

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, May 1--The liberal Argentine Constitution of 1853, which was supplanted in 1949 by the Charter of Gen. Juan D. Per n, again became the law of this land today.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, May 1--The liberal Argentine Constitution of 1853, which was supplanted in 1949 by the Charter of Gen. Juan D. Per n, again became the law of this land today.

headline.main: ARGENTINA VOIDS PERON'S CHARTER; Liberal Constitution of 1853 Is Restored--Free Labor Union Election Pledged Provincial Charters Voided
